p: The 10 mg of frozen powder of each sample was weighed and dissolved in 1 mL of distilled water to prepare a stock solution. The stock solution of 10 mg/mL concentration was diluted up to 50 µg/mL of working solution and stored in −30 °C up to date of analysis. The working aliquots were sonicated for 10 min using the Branson sonicator (Branson Ultrasonics, CT, USA) before analytes for VOC extraction. The samples were prepared in 20 mL headspace Supelco vials (Missouri, USA) consisted of 1 mL of EDTA solution, 1 mL of the sample solution, and 10 μL of IS.
